title: Vocaroo contest! PRIZES!!!
body:
[Finished and prizes are being sent out~ Please accept my add in game for code~]

Stuff to know~ 

$25 prize for best Veigar impersonation.
$25 prize for best Sion impersonation.
$25 prize for best Lulu impersonation.
$10 prize for best Ahri death sound impersonation.

All you have to do is send me a vocaroo link with two quotes from that champion while using your own vocal chords and trying to sound at least somewhat accurate. I'll choose the best impersonation and give that person who did so a prize. Also the quotes must be from the champion and not made up ones, basically the things they say in game.

You may not win two $25 prizes but the $10 one you can win even if you received a higher prize.

I'll end the contest and choose the winners for each prize on Saturday at a time where I can be active and on here. 

Also if you don't know what vocaroo is, it's a recording site that let's you record whatever and share it with people.

http://vocaroo.com/

Proof that I'm for real~

http://puu.sh/mf3oE/e92079c25c.jpg
